title: HOW ARE INDIANS still TREATED IN TURKEY?
description:
This video breaks stereotypes. While exploring the rural areas around Cappadocia in Turkey, I met several local Turkish people. I hitchhiked to meet them and see their reaction when I told them, 'I am an Indian'.  #travelvlog  #MountainTrekker #Turkey 

# All videos from this Turkey series - https://bit.ly/MTturkey2022

If you like my videos, PLEASE SHARE them and let others get inspired to explore this beautiful world. SUBSCRIBE - http://bit.ly/subscribeMT
